answers.answer: Thy usually dont start kick couts for like another month and baby can turn even durin labor for some women.
Right??? Thats what I'm saying :"/ thats why im so worried like why are they rushing it and stuff :/ but I do have a stomach infection rn...

You're only 24 weeks, are you still in the hospital. Kick counts are done after 29 weeks. Not eating will definitely put your baby in danger. But if the Dr says your baby is going to be big for its gestational age, you may have Gestational diabetes. Stay healthy Sweetie
Your baby has plenty of time to turn. I wouldn't worry until you're 36 or 37 weeks along and he is still breech
That's what I thought that's why I'm so confused on why these drs and nurses are telling me to count and worry about these things so early on

question: My stomach was so much better yesterday,  but worse today, havent eaten since Wednesday at 5... so ive had a lot of ivs in the last couple of days. So painful:"( anyways I'm 24 weeks tomorrow, I'm on kick counts, and my baby is still breeched. Theyre talking about a c section before 40 weeks because my baby may be too big to turn and my stomach is already really hard... but my u.s. tech said my baby was measuring fine... I'm just so scared now and idk im praying for the best in everything. Am I in denial or isnt 24 weeks too early for kick counts and to worry if the baby is still breeched or not..
title: update and terrified:"(
